com.bitplane.xt.ImarisApplication

  • Packages that use ImarisApplication 
    Package Description
    com.bitplane.xt

    • Uses of ImarisApplication in com.bitplane.xt

      Classes in com.bitplane.xt that implement ImarisApplication 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DefaultImarisApplication
      Default implementation of ImarisApplication, which wraps IApplicationPrx and represents one particular Imaris instance.
      Methods in com.bitplane.xt that return ImarisApplication 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      ImarisApplication DefaultImarisService.getApplication() 
      ImarisApplication ImarisService.getApplication()
      Get the first running Imaris instance, or null if there are no running instances.
      ImarisApplication DefaultImarisService.getApplicationByID(int applicationId) 
      ImarisApplication ImarisService.getApplicationByID(int applicationId)
      Get the running Imaris instance with the specified ICE object ID.
      Methods in com.bitplane.xt that return types with arguments of type ImarisApplication 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<ImarisApplication> DefaultImarisService.getApplications() 
      List<ImarisApplication> ImarisService.getApplications()
      Get list of all running Imaris instances.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
